welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hillsborough, where southern charm meets vibrant history. Get ready to explore our quaint town, known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, where all domestic and international flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights, providing a more luxurious and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United Airlines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
